name: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 40
description: Versatile running shoe with responsive cushioning. Perfect for daily training and long runs. Features Zoom Air units in forefoot and heel for smooth transitions. Breathable mesh upper keeps feet cool.

name: Brooks Ghost 15
description: Smooth and reliable neutral running shoe. DNA LOFT cushioning for soft landings. Segmented Crash Pad adapts to your stride. Great for runners with flat feet seeking support.

name: ASICS Gel-Kayano 30
description: Premium stability running shoe designed for overpronators. FF BLAST PLUS cushioning provides excellent energy return. 4D GUIDANCE SYSTEM for adaptive stability. Ideal for long-distance runners needing support.

name: Dell XPS 15 (2024)
description: Premium laptop for professionals and creators. 15.6-inch 4K OLED display with stunning colors. Intel Core i7-13700H processor with 32GB RAM. NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4050 GPU for creative work and light gaming.

name: MacBook Pro 14-inch M3
description: Apple's powerful laptop with M3 chip for professionals. Liquid Retina XDR display delivers incredible visuals. Up to 22 hours battery life. Perfect for developers, video editors, and creative professionals.

name: ASUS ROG Zephyrus G14
description: Compact gaming laptop with serious power. AMD Ryzen 9 7940HS and NVIDIA RTX 4060. 14-inch QHD display at 165Hz. Lightweight at 3.64 lbs, perfect for gaming on the go.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5
description: Industry-leading noise cancelling headphones. Exceptional sound quality with 30mm drivers. Up to 30 hours battery life. Perfect for travel, work, and music lovers. Comfortable for all-day wear.

name: Bose QuietComfort Ultra
description: Premium wireless headphones with spatial audio. CustomTune technology adapts to your ears. World-class noise cancellation. Luxurious comfort with soft ear cushions.

name: Canon EOS R6 Mark II
description: Full-frame mirrorless camera for enthusiasts and professionals. 24.2MP sensor with excellent low-light performance. 40 fps continuous shooting. 6K video recording. Perfect for wildlife and sports photography.

name: Sony A7 IV
description: Versatile full-frame hybrid camera. 33MP sensor balances resolution and speed. Advanced AI autofocus with real-time tracking. 4K 60fps video. Ideal for photography and videography beginners to pros.

name: Fujifilm X-T5
description: Retro-styled APS-C mirrorless camera with 40MP sensor. Classic film simulations beloved by photographers. Compact and lightweight. Excellent for street photography and travel. Great image quality in a portable package.

name: iPhone 15 Pro Max
description: Apple's flagship smartphone with titanium design. A17 Pro chip delivers console-quality gaming. Pro camera system with 5x telephoto. Action button for quick shortcuts. USB-C connectivity.

name: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra
description: Samsung's ultimate smartphone with S Pen. 200MP camera with AI enhancements. Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 for Galaxy processor. 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED display. Best for power users and photographers.

name: Google Pixel 8 Pro
description: Google's AI-powered flagship with best-in-class computational photography. Tensor G3 chip. 7 years of OS updates. Temperature sensor. Perfect for photography enthusiasts who want the best point-and-shoot experience.

name: Garmin Forerunner 965
description: Premium GPS running watch with AMOLED display. Advanced training metrics and performance analytics. Full-color maps for navigation. Up to 23 days battery life. Perfect for serious runners and triathletes.
